name: P07
prompt: Security camera footage from elevated doorbell camera, suburban home front porch at night. Single porch light provides harsh overhead illumination with deep shadows. A person in dark hoodie with hood pulled up, face obscured by hood, average build, moving with deliberate slow pace. They crouch down near the door, staying low and out of direct light. Fixed camera position, wide-angle lens with slight barrel distortion, fisheye edge distortion, IR-tinted footage quality typical of home security systems, slight grain. Realistic human motion, 15-second duration.
